name: Weather App
points: Developed a responsive weather application that provides real-time weather updates using location-based services and API integration.
Built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript and integrated third-party weather APIs.
Displays temperature, humidity, and precipitation with real-time updates.
Implements geolocation for automatic weather detection.
Ensured responsive design for seamless experience across devices.
Optimized API fetching and data parsing for performance efficiency.

name: Zentry.com Clone
points: Built a high-performance React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS clone, ensuring a responsive UI and seamless user experience.
Developed key features like gamified portals (NEXUS), cross-platform rewards (RADIANT), and digital collectibles (ZIGMA).

name: Restaurant Application
points: Developed a restaurant website using CSS for a visually appealing design, while React and JSX provide interactivity.
Offers an engaging user experience with features like meals of the day, typically categorized as breakfast, lunch, and dinner menus.

name: Blogging Website
points: Developed a full-stack blog application with admin panel functionality, allowing users to create, manage, and display blog posts.
Built the front-end of the application using Next.js and Tailwind CSS, ensuring a responsive and user-friendly interface.
Integrated MongoDB to store blog posts, user data, and other essential information, ensuring the database was well-structured for fast retrieval and scalability.

name: Finance Tracker Website
points: Designed and built both the client-side and server-side of the application using Next.js for server-side rendering and routing.
Integrated MongoDB as the database to store and manage user data such as transactions, budgets, and financial goals.
Created a responsive, user-friendly interface with Tailwind CSS, ensuring the application is visually appealing and functional across all devices.
Implemented data validation and transaction management features to track expenses and income and generate financial reports.
Managed the database properly by organizing collections, setting up indexes, and ensuring efficient data queries.
Utilized TypeScript for type safety, improving the maintainability and scalability of the codebase.
Implemented authentication and user session management for secure login and data privacy.
